changelog:
- kernel: 4.9.181 Upstream (beryllium, tissot, vince)
- kernel: 4.14.125 Upstream (violet)
- kernel: 4.4.181 Upstream (lavender)
- Added official Oneplus 3 support
- Introduce new ROM logos
- Switch to Google bootanimation [TEMP]
- New default wallpaper
- SwipeToScreenshot: Import MIUI implementation
- Smart Charging fixes
- New advanced location tile options
- Added QS header styles
- Allowed heads-up to draw beyond bounds
- Added toggle to disable charging animation
- Wakeup when plugged or unplugged
- Refactor VoLTE icon toggle
- Fixed statusbar battery color issues
- Other fixes and system optimizations
